typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	purgeFiles: true,
	wildcardPaths:['LP*.csv']) ~> LSVSource
